name: RaceRoom - ADAC GT Masters Experience 2014
description: NOTICE: This content requires the base game RaceRoom Racing Experience (free of charge) on Steam in order to play. ABOUT THE GAME			Enter the League of Super Sports Cars and experience the thrill of GT3 class racing with ADAC GT Masters Experience 2014.ADAC GT Masters Experience brings you all 8 tracks and 19 team cars from the 2014 Championship season.	Sixteen races stand between you and becoming an ADAC GT Masters Champion. ADAC GT Masters is a Pro-Am series, each event consists of two races where players must switch virtual drivers during a pit stop. When computer controlled cars swap drivers, the AI driver skillset will be changed to provide a new degree of opponent difficulty. 	  Unparalleled realism and racing excitement is yours in ADAC GT Masters Experience.Start your ADAC GT Masters motorsport career now!KEY FEATURES			     Authentic 2014 ADAC GT Masters Championship    24 Player Online Multiplayer    Genre leading audio    3 different physics models    ADAC Pitstop Rules and RegulationsSYSTEM REQUIREMENTS 		    System: Windows Vista, 7, 8  CPU: Dual core at 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo Processor or AMD equivalent  RAM : 2 GB  Hard drive space: 18 GB  Vcard: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 1.5 Video Card or AMD equivalent  Game Size unpacked: 6 GB
